website_summaries.verdict: The iPhone 5s may be small, but it's packed with more power than any other smartphone on the market today. It's the best bet for anyone who wants a future-proof, forward-looking phone that runs an unbeatable array of apps.
cons: Small screen for an industry-leading smartphone

customer_reviews.title: touch id is awesome
customer_reviews.text: before ordering the iphone 5s i was like man whats the point of touch id it sounds like a stupid gimmick. in reality its a great tool for phone security because people don't see you put in your password. I also like that it's faster to log into my phone.
customer_reviews.author: bhoff

customer_reviews.title: Go buy a iPhone SE instead.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great phone it's time but my 5s was defective. I bought a SE and couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: ade12

customer_reviews.title: Overall a nice little phone though the antennae seems a little week ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice little phone though the antennae seems a little week to me. I was up in the mountains near my home and my sons cheap go phone had better reception. Both phones are AT&T...
customer_reviews.author: Timotheus

customer_reviews.title: It's very annoying.
customer_reviews.text: The phone they sent me was manufactured for sale in Japan (or another similar country) and thus I cannot shut off the camera shutter sound. It's very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it. It didn't work. Customer service was helpful though.
customer_reviews.author: THP1203

customer_reviews.title: Phone got progressively worse. Junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my son so I was unaware that the touch screen was malfunctioning from day one. Phone got progressively worse. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Apple iPhone 5s 64GB
customer_reviews.text: I love the phone a lot it didn't come with no scratches no dings it came fast like it was suppose to and this is my first iphone. The only things I didn't understand is when it restarts itself sometimes without warning and sometimes it gives you a blue screen of death and then it will shut right back on I been trying to find solutions about it but the only way the blue screen of death stops to me is when you charge the phone and don't wait until it ran out of juice. Overall this is a very good very nice phone
customer_reviews.author: pinkzie

customer_reviews.title: Lots of apps without slowing gown
customer_reviews.text: 64GB is the way to go! Music, games, podcasts, books easily contained and no slowing down the phone. I am an apple fan when it comes to ease of use
customer_reviews.author: John F. Herberger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the fingerprint access instead of using a code!
customer_reviews.author: ARMom

customer_reviews.title: Good Phone,but not unlocked as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I love this iphone,but unfortunately it came locked to At&t.I had to unlock it online on At&t website,which took me only a few minutes to get done for free.I did not think it would be that easy to unlock an At&t phone,but it was a very good experience.The phone works good,but it came repackaged with accessories not certified by Apple. Very good Phone,I am enjoying it
customer_reviews.author: B.J

customer_reviews.title: Check your storage when ordering
customer_reviews.text: The product description and box both say 64gb. I received a 16gb product. Disappointing due to this being a birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING deal, Great Item, Great transaction! can't believe how well it works!!! and the condition was better the advertised!!!

customer_reviews.title: faulty product

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this seller!

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: The product came in less than a week. It was in perfect condition and was as described. I was able to activate the phone immediately with no issues what so ever.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: For a used product, this phone has been great. I've been using it now for about a month and half with absolutely zero issues.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Apple iPhone 5S
customer_reviews.text: Screen was spotless, Phone was almost flawless, very happy with purchase, would buy from again.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best phone I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best phone I ever had ! 64 gb gives me all the storage I need ! And this phone is way faster than my 4s was !

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as described in the post and works like it should.

customer_reviews.title: 5 star phone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: said that the new. Аnd he scratched

customer_reviews.title: The perfect phone at just the right time!
customer_reviews.text: The 5s is a great phone period and this one was exactly as described by the seller. I found this at a perfect time! I had just dropped my 4s at work (one too many times). :-( That's on me. The device still works great, but the antenna got some damage and calls were being dropped. So I needed another phone. Enter Amazon... Thank you Amazon for bringing us together!
customer_reviews.author: Samson

customer_reviews.title: I love the form factor
customer_reviews.text: I love the form factor. Just the right size for my needs. The 6 was too large for someone who usually keeps the phone in his pocket. The extra memory means I'll never run out of room for apps and pics. Plenty fast even with the new OS.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worked with me to make it right!
customer_reviews.text: After some issues, not by the seller, the Item was as described. It's perfect! And they gave me a car charger and two phones cases for the mishap. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick E.

customer_reviews.title: iphone 5s.
customer_reviews.text: Very good used iphone 5s. Product came exactly as described in product details. Good batter life, cosmetic condition. And shipping was fast after an initial wait period.

customer_reviews.title: ... okay and the battery life has not gotten much better since the 4 days
customer_reviews.text: The phone is okay and the battery life has not gotten much better since the 4 days.

customer_reviews.text: Combined used and available space is only 20 gigs. Where are the other 40?

customer_reviews.title: AT&T moved everything from his android phone very easily.
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves his new phone. AT&T moved everything from his android phone very easily.

customer_reviews.title: It's like new
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks like a new iPhone I'm more then happy with my new iPhone and would and will recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: Mine works perfectly! I have yet to find any scratches on the screen, so it's in great condition! Plus, I have over 2500 songs and tons of apps on my phone now and I still have about 38 GB of free space! I am EXTREMELY pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Melanimal

product_meta.title: Apple iPhone 5S 64 GB AT&T, Space Gray
product_meta.description: Network Technology GSM / HSPA / EVDO / LTE Launch Announced 2013, September Status Available. Released 2013, September Body Dimensions 123.8 x 58.6 x 7.6 mm (4.87 x 2.31 x 0.30 in) Weight 112 g (3.95 oz) SIM Nano-SIM Display Type LED-backlit IPS LCD, capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors Size 4.0 inches (~60.8% screen-to-body ratio) Resolution 640 x 1136 pixels (~326 ppi pixel density) Multitouch Yes Protection Corning Gorilla Glass, oleophobic coating Platform OS iOS 7, upgradable to iOS 10.2 Chipset Apple A7 CPU Dual-core 1.3 GHz Cyclone (ARM v8-based) GPU PowerVR G6430 (quad-core graphics) Memory Card slot No Internal 16/32/64 GB, 1 GB RAM DDR3 Camera Primary 8 MP, 3264 x 2448 pixels, autofocus, dual-LED (dual tone) flash, check quality Features 1/3' sensor size, 1.5 µm pixel size, touch focus, geo-tagging, face/smile detection, HDR (photo/panorama) Video 1080p@30fps, 720p@120fps, check quality Secondary 1.2 MP, 720p@30fps, face detection, FaceTime over Wi-Fi or Cellular Sound Alert types Vibration, proprietary ringtones Loudspeaker Yes 3.5mm jack Yes Comms WLAN Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n, dual-band, hotspot Bluetooth v4.0, A2DP GPS Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS Radio No USB v2.0, reversible connector Features Sensors Fingerprint, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass Messaging iMessage, SMS (threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Email Browser HTML5 (Safari) Java No - Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic - Siri natural language commands and dictation - iCloud cloud service - iCloud Keychain - TV-out - Maps - Audio/video player/editor - Organizer - Document viewer/editor - Photo viewer/editor - Voice memo/dial/command - Predictive text input Battery Non-removable Li-Po 1560 mAh battery (5.92 Wh) Stand-by Up to 250 h (2G) / Up to 250 h (3G) Talk time Up to 10 h (2G) / Up to 10 h (3G)
feature_bullets: This update to the iPhone 5 comes equipped with a faster Apple A7 processor, an improved 8-megapixel camera, while also adding a Touch ID fingerprint sensor into the home button
Other features of the iPhone 5s include a 4-inch Retina display, AirPlay media streaming, Siri voice assistant, front facing camera, and 4G LTE high-speed data
This model comes with 64GB of internal storage and supports WiFi connectivity, so you can browse the Web, stream videos, shop online, and chat with friends from wherever you are
The iPhone 5s offers a slim and stylish design that is both lightweight and easy to carry, and is also equipped for international use
This product has been extensively tested, is certified to be 100% functional, and ready for activation

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars415 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Other camera features: 8 MP Back Camera, 1.2 MP Front Camera
